item.title: Reconciliation
item.description: Note: This essay was written for an English First People’s Assignment, thank you. Reconciliation is an interesting topic. It’s also an incredibly complicated one. For any of you in the audience who aren’t Canadian, Truth and Reconciliation is an ongoing effort by the Government of Canada, and to varying degrees Canadian citizens, to make amends for the horrors enacted upon the First Peoples of Canada during colonization and the Residential School system.
